# {{COURSE_NAME}} - Resources

> Supporting materials and reference documentation

## Resource Directory

```
resources/
├── by-module/          # Module-specific resources
├── common/             # Shared across all modules
├── instructor/         # Instructor-only materials
└── reference/          # General reference materials
```

---

| Resource | Purpose | Audience |

| [Troubleshooting](reference/troubleshooting-guide.md) | Problem solving | Students |
| [Instructor Guide](instructor/INSTRUCTOR-GUIDE.md) | Teaching guidance | Instructors |
